#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
long long mulmod(long long a,long long b,long long c){
    long long x = 0,y=a%c;
    while(b > 0){
        if(b%2 == 1){
            x = (x+y);
            if(x>=c)
                x%=c;
        }
        y = (y*2);
        if(y>=c)
            y%=c;
        b /= 2;
    }
    return x%c;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long a,b,n,i,c;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&b);
        if(n<=1 && b==1)
        {
            cout<<"Odd\n";
            continue;
        }
        
        c=1;
        a=0;
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
        {
            a=(a*i+(long long)floor(((long double)(c)/b)*(i)))%2;
            c=mulmod(c,i,b);
        }
        if(a==0)
            printf("Even\n");
        else
            printf("Odd\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
